name: FindMeAJob
0:
”Alexa, find me a job”
”Alexa, launch find me a job”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: find me a job
des:
Find jobs near you. Simply tell Alexa a job title you’re interested in. To get started, ask Alexa to “find me a job.”

This job search skill is powered by CareerOneStop’s Job Finder. The Job Finder lets you search thousands of job listings that are updated daily from all over the United States. CareerOneStop is sponsored by the U.S. Department of Labor.

Features:
- Search jobs near you
- Search jobs by title or other keyword
- Search any local area in the country
- Get step-by-step voice help

New to CareerOneStop? Learn more at www.careeronestop.org.

We'd love to hear from you! If you have questions, comments, or feedback, please e-mail us at info@careeronestop.org.
